text.author: Bill Fite
text.summary: In a letter to Katherine (accompanied by carbon copies of two letters to his father) on September 15, 1946, Bill writes about the progress of a conference he is attending in Paris and his activities (often in the company of Bert) in the occasional time he can get off, including lâ€™Opera, lunches, a detour to visit churches, and a cocktail birthday party, then describes his day.
text.title: Letter from Bill to Katherine Fite
